User

A an object wrapping the current ShiftSpace User.  Use this class to check the user’s display name as well as checking if the user is logged in or out.

Summary
UserA an object wrapping the current ShiftSpace User.
Functions
getUsernameReturns the logged in user’s name.
isLoggedInChecks whether there is a logged in user.
login (private)Login a user.
logout (private)Logout a user.
join (private)Join a new user.
updateUpdate a user’s info.
resetPassword (private)Reset a user’s password

Functions

getUsername

getUsername: function()

Returns the logged in user’s name.

Returns

User name as string.  Returns false if there is no logged in user.

isLoggedIn

isLoggedIn: function(showErrorAlert)

Checks whether there is a logged in user.

Returns

A boolean.

login (private)

login: function(credentials,
_callback)

Login a user.  Will probably be moved into ShiftSpace.js.

Parameters

credentialsobject with username and password properties.
_callbacka function to be called when login action is complete.

logout (private)

logout: function()

Logout a user.  Will probably be moved into ShiftSpace.js.

join (private)

join: function(userInfo,
callback)

Join a new user.  Will probably be moved into ShiftSpace.js.

update

update: function(info,
callback)

Update a user’s info.

Parameters

infoinfo to be updated.
callbackcallback function to be run when update server call is complete.

resetPassword (private)

resetPassword: function(info,
callback)

Reset a user’s password

Parameters

info?
callbackcallback function to be run when resetPassword is complete.
